channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Greetings from Guhagar, India, where newly hatched turtles get some help into the sea
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Trump administration investigates Medicaid spending on immigrants in Democratic states
Tesla shareholders to vote on investing in Musk’s AI startup xAI
item.description: A shareholder proposal would allow Tesla to invest in Elon Musk's rival AI firm, xAI if approved. Tesla's board didn't recommend one way or another.

item.title: Scale AI’s former CTO launches AI agent that could solve big data’s biggest problem
item.description: Isotopes, co-founded by Arun Murthy, launched a sophisticated analytics agent. Arun was one of the creators of Hadoop who later joined Scale AI.

item.title: Girls fell behind boys in math during the pandemic. Schools are trying to make up lost ground
item.description: Efforts to close the gender gap in STEM education are gaining momentum after setbacks during the COVID-19 pandemic.

item.title: OpenAI hires the team behind Xcode coding assistant Alex Codes
item.description: The team behind Alex Codes, which built a popular tool that let devs use AI models within Apple's development suite Xcode, is joining OpenAI.
